message.body: ï¿¼Told you! I am not upset but I am going to respond calmly and also comment on his lack of professionalism. I don't think I need to have a meeting though. I feel like he should have been clear and honest from the get. O well. I am not dealing with this today:) love you!
What is there to talk about the crane? It is a separate space and I sure as hell am never working w him
In fact, I blocked everyone from the last drop except for adam and mike
From all my social media the second I got out of there. I've never met such horrible people before. It was a pretty awful experience in general
there is no reason to have a meeting. You tell him good luck w the last drop and that the crane is your space and you are moving on to bigger and better things
All those men are just horrific
Arrogant entitled and negative. They won't last a second working together lolol bc they are bratty children
